scenario_text.value:
You’ve been quiet for a while now, Aoi.
Is everything okay?
I, I mean... This is the boy’s restroom...

Huh? ...Oh! OH. Uh, right, you can wait
outside!

No, I’ll look, too! This is for Labramon,
after all!

I’m a little embarrassed, but I’ll do my
best...

(Jeez, she’s really serious about this. Now’s
not the time to get flustered.)

After we’re done here, we’ll check the girls’
bathroom next just in case, okay?
Ulp... Uh, yeah, I guess we should, huh?

Normally I wouldn’t dream of it... But for
Labramon’s sake, we have to try!
